org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class Site

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.AbstractIdentityObject
      org.webcurator.domain.model.core.Site
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgencyOwnable, Annotatable, HasDatabaseIdentity, HasIdentity, HasOid
public class Site
extends AbstractIdentityObject
implements Annotatable, AgencyOwnable

Represents a Site object. A site is a collection of related URL patterns and maintains a record of what agencies have or have not given permission to harvest the site. Note that Sites were renamed to HarvestAuthorisations midway through this project. They are thus called in the User Interface but keep the "Site" names throughout the code-base.

getUrlPatterns

public java.util.Set<UrlPattern> getUrlPatterns()
Gets the set of UrlPatterns related to this site. This set should be treated as read only. To add or remove URL patterns, use the addUrlPattern/removeUrlPattern methods.

Returns:
The set of URL Patterns associated with this site.

getRemovedPermissions

public java.util.Set<Permission> getRemovedPermissions()
Return the set of permissions that have been removed from this permission object since it was loaded from the database. This is a management function so that the SiteManager can control the saving of permissions.

Returns:
Returns the removedPermissions.
